title: Field Trip to Pantages Theater: Lion King
description: The ASB is sponsoring a field trip to Pantages Theater in Hollywood. We are going to see The Lion King on March 18th, 2023. It is a Saturday trip, 8 am to 8 pm. We will have lunch (on your own) at Universal Citywalk and then see the matinee show and be home by 8. Reserve your ticket at the QR code outside the PE Room. We have 45 seats to sell. The price will be under $115 - we will have a set price once we know the cost of the bus. If you have questions, see Mr. Benslay

title: Speech Tournament (IE #3)
description: Good luck to our UHS Speech team as they compete at IE #3 at Clovis East on Saturday, December 3rd. The tournament call time is 8:00 AM (Dr. Jarocki would like everyone competing to be there at 7:45 AM). Please remember to the fill out the Remind form Aubrey sends out to avoid complications in your registration. Direct any questions to Dr. Jarockiâ€“ he will be hosting practice in his room after school on Wednesday and Thursday! Good luck everybody! :)

title: Choir Concert
description: The upcoming Choir Concert is December 1st at the Paul Shaghoian Memorial Concert Hall at 7 PM. Dr. Moore has put together a wonderful selection of choral pieces (holiday, too!) for your enjoyment. Tickets are on sale for $5 in the Front Office, and contact them (or Dr. Moore for specifics) for questions. (Seniors, this is a great Extra Credit opportunity as well :)

title: Jazz Band + Show Choir Concert
description: The upcoming Show Choir and Jazz Band Concert is December 6th at the Fresno State Concert Hall at 7 PM. Dr. Moore and Dr. Cornelison have put together a very merry set to celebrate the holidays. Tickets are on sale for $5 in the Front Office, and contact them (or Dr. Moore/Dr. C for specifics) for questions. (Seniors, this is a great Extra Credit opportunity as well :)

title: FPU + Wind Ensemble Concert
description: The upcoming JOINT FPU + UHSWind Ensemble is December 8th at the FPU Cultural Arts Center at 7 PM. Tickets may be purchased directly through FPU, and contact Dr. C for specific questions.

title: ASB
description: There will be an ASB Meeting on Thursday at lunch in the choir room. Please attend, and you'll earn Spirit Points for your class!

title: Drop-Off
description: Please try to avoid dropping off in the Visitor Parking Lot at the back of UHS. It's best to drop off at the side of the school facing Shaw.
